-- Accounts — business-oriented EDA questions
-- Q1 — Which sectors generate the highest average revenue?
SELECT 
    sector,
    AVG(revenue) AS avg_revenue,
    office_location
FROM dbo.vAccounts
GROUP BY sector, office_location
ORDER BY avg_revenue DESC

-- Q2 — How many employees do companies typically have in each sector?

SELECT 
    COUNT(employees) AS total_employees,
    parent_company,
    sector
FROM dbo.vAccounts
GROUP BY sector, parent_company
ORDER BY total_employees DESC

-- Q3 — Which office locations have the most accounts?
SELECT 
    office_location,
    COUNT(account) AS total_accounts
FROM dbo.vAccounts
GROUP BY office_location
ORDER BY total_accounts DESC

-- Products — business-oriented EDA questions
-- Q1 — What is the average sales price per series?
SELECT 
    series,
    AVG(sales_price) AS avg_sales_price
FROM dbo.vProducts
GROUP BY series
ORDER BY avg_sales_price DESC
-- Q2 — Which products are the most expensive?
SELECT 
    product,
    MAX(sales_price) AS high_price
FROM dbo.vProducts
GROUP BY product
ORDER BY high_price DESC

-- Q3 — How many products exist per series?
SELECT
    series,
    COUNT(product) AS count_products
FROM dbo.vProducts
GROUP BY series
ORDER BY count_products DESC

-- Sales Pipeline — meaningful EDA for opportunities
-- Q1 — Which deal stages have the most opportunities?
SELECT
    deal_stage,
    COUNT(opportunity_id) AS opportunities
FROM dbo.vSalesPipeline
GROUP BY deal_stage
ORDER BY opportunities DESC

-- Q2 — What is the average deal value per stage?
SELECT
    AVG(close_value) AS avg_deal,
    deal_stage
FROM dbo.vSalesPipeline
GROUP BY deal_stage
HAVING AVG(close_value) IS NOT NULL
AND AVG(close_value) > 0
ORDER BY avg_deal DESC

-- Q3 — Which sales agents have the highest total pipeline value?
SELECT
    sales_agent,
    MAX(close_value) AS total_pipeline_value
FROM dbo.vSalesPipeline
GROUP BY sales_agent
ORDER BY total_pipeline_value DESC

-- Sales Teams — business-oriented EDA questions
-- Q1 — How many sales agents report to each manager?
SELECT 
    manager,
    COUNT(sales_agent) AS each_sales_agent
FROM dbo.vSalesTeams
GROUP BY manager
ORDER BY each_sales_agent DESC

-- Q2 — How many sales agents are assigned per regional office?
SELECT 
    regional_office,
    COUNT(sales_agent) AS each_sales_agent
FROM dbo.vSalesTeams
GROUP BY regional_office
ORDER BY each_sales_agent DESC

-- Q3 — Which managers handle the most regions (if a manager has agents in multiple offices)?
SELECT 
    manager,
    COUNT(DISTINCT(regional_office)) AS distinct_regional_office
FROM dbo.vSalesTeams
GROUP BY manager
ORDER BY distinct_regional_office DESC

-- Data Dictionary — metadata EDA
-- Q1 — What fields contain the word "date"?
SELECT 
    field,
    description
FROM dbo.vDataDictionary
WHERE field LIKE '%date%'
